# GALE-Unchained-UI.
Master repository for Unchained Platform's front-end application


### Workflow

To propose significant new features, open pull requests based on and made against the develop branch. It's the branch for features that will go into the next Unchained-UI release.

To propose fixes and backwards-compatible improvements, please work on the latest release branch. This is the branch that will become the next release ("the next version of Unchained UI").

Security fixes will be backported to older branches by the core team as appropriate.


### Requirements
Unchained-UI requires

 * Django 1.8.x,
 * Python 3.4.x
 * Wagtail 1.6.x

Front-End requirement
 * Node.js version 6.x.x

### Installation

This project can be installed using pip and npm:

####Step 1
To install the development version of the python library:

    git+ssh://git@github.com/Gale43/GALE-Unchained-UI.git@development

To use a specific release, for example, `0.3.0` use:

    git+ssh://git@github.com/Gale43/GALE-Unchained-UI.git@0.3.0

####Step 2
For the react based UI installation, include the following in your `package.json`

    "unchained_ui": "git+ssh://git@github.com/Gale43/GALE-Unchained-UI.git#development"

To use a specific release, for example, `0.3.0` use:

    "unchained_ui": "git+ssh://git@github.com/Gale43/GALE-Unchained-UI.git#0.3.0"

##How to Upgrade to new unchained releases

Run these commands to complete the migration to a new unchained release

```
cp src/server/config/settings/.env.example src/server/config/settings/.env (inside vagrant)
docker-compose exec app pip install -r src/server/requirements/base.txt (inside vagrant)
docker-compose exec app python src/server/manage.py migrate (inside vagrant)
npm install (outside vagrant)
```
